name: Drunkard Bird
description:
Guş is a carrier pigeon. We wish he wouldn't drink this much. The worst part is, he writes drunk letters to his unforgettable ex-girlfriend.

Guş flies drunkenly, so you need to draw obstacles in air to guide Guş to his destination. You need to collect all the papers. Also, you should avoid beers, because they make Guş's movement much more random.
